remarks.para: Except for ER operations, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: With one Electronic Engine Control (EEC) system inoperative, plan flight with both EECs turned off to prevent unacceptable throttle stagger. With the EECs inoperative or turned off, there will be no Command Sector indication (see following illustration). Observe thrust limits.
Observe (L/R) Engine Limiter EICAS message is not displayed. (ELC provides N1 limit operation.)

placard.para: Placard Electronic Engine Control (EEC) system(s) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Place Left and Right Engine EEC Control Switches (Pilot's overhead panel) to the INOP position.
